snippet: Discovery Communications struck two deals on Friday aimed at expanding its reach in Europe, including buying the Nordic arm of the German broadcaster ProSiebenSat.1.
abstract: Discovery Communications struck two deals on Friday aimed at expanding its reach in Europe, including buying the Nordic arm of the German broadcaster ProSiebenSat.1.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Discovery Strikes 2 Deals in Bid for International Growth
